definition: to pay a formal visit/to call to pay respects/to pay homage (at a monument, mausoleum etc)

sentences.english: ARabari woman in Gujarat visits the grave of an ancestor.
sentences.chinese: 古吉拉特的一位拉巴尼妇女拜谒先人的陵墓。

sentences.english: If you are of Chinese descent you may pay tribute to the tomb of Huangdi (Yellow Emperor) first Chinese emperor.
sentences.chinese: 作为炎黄子孙还可以去拜谒离西安不远的黄帝陵。

sentences.english: He went to visit the graves of his forefathers.
sentences.chinese: 他去拜谒他祖先的墓地。

definition: to worship/to observe religious rites/to pay one's respects (to one's ancestors etc)
to visit/to pay one's respects to (a revered figure etc)/to pay homage (at a tomb etc)
to pay homage at a mausoleum
to call to pay one's respect/to call on
to worship/to make customary deferences to/a pilgrimage
to visit a place for the memories/to pay homage to (the deceased)
to burn incense at a temple
to pay a formal visit/to call to pay respects/to meet one's senior or superior
to formally call on/to worship (a God)/to pay homage to sb
to give audience (of emperor)/retainers' duty to pay respect to sovereign/hajj (Islam)
to have an audience (with the Emperor)
a worship ceremony for the dead/to offer sacrifice (to ancestors)/a libation
